Title: Chameli
Writer: Anant Balani (original concept), Shivkumar Subramaniam (screenplay), Sudhir Mishra (screenplay), Swanand Kirkire (dialogue)
Actors: Kareena Kapoor Khan, Rahul Bose, Rinke Khanna, Yashpal Sharma
Plot: On a rainy night, when an investment banker's car breaks down in the red light district, he takes shelter where he meets and later befriends a prostitute.
